title: Wrongfully banned
body:
Hi everyone I am a fellow league player, 9 days ago I was banned for something I didn't do. I had no warnings previous to this. my friend was pissing me off so I banned him from the discord,  keep in mind he has a hacking squad, and he and his squad got my account, went into ranked game, that I started but was logged off when there was 2 seconds of q left, and they fed and said some pretty bad stuff. I wouldn't recommend pissing people off but I was being spammed by 5 people in the server to ban him so that's what I did and they got my favorite game back. I have spent a good amount of time and money in  this game. I can sometimes be toxic but very rarely will I swear at you unless I'm joking. Riot Plz unban me. It will be great if you all can support me 

ign: DrComboWombo

replies.body:
> my friend was pissing me off so I banned him from the discord, keep in mind he has a hacking squad, 

What the hell kind of friends do you keep?

> [{quoted}](name=Anti Teemo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=kM0sXk0k,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-06-07T21:35:15.268+0000)
>
> What the hell kind of friends do you keep?

Obviously not the good kind.
Its not my friend and I told my irl friend not to invite him but he did and he blackmailed me

You can contact support and make the argument that someone else gained access to your account against your permission and your best efforts. They could then look at the access logs of the account and make a judgement. 

But seriously, that doesn't sound like a friend.
That doesn't sound like a friend your friend should keep either.
I told my friend that go kys and have a nice day so we arent frineds now
A person that tells other people to kill themselves doesn't sound like a particularly nice person to be around either.
Nobody hacked your account, especially not some skiddie brat that is probably 12 years old (if even that).
There 20 and im 21 so fuck off
Amounts to the same thing, considering the situation. It sounds more like you gave your friend your password, like every other case of "my 'friend' hacked my account".

Did you submit a support ticket?

It's a sad story, and I'd love to help, but people lie about stuff like this all the time, and there's not much we can do, especially with no proof.
How do I summit a ticket

> [{quoted}](name=DrComboWombo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=kM0sXk0k,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-06-08T21:01:28.830+0000)
>
> How do I summit a ticket

Go to [Riot Games Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) to submit a ticket and include as many details as possible about your case and account as well also.
Before you waste ur time with a TICKET. Riot can and see the IP and LOC of where the account being played... Other then that ur out of luck
Im sorry but this isnt believable
I never lie when I really love something and its taken away from me
